selectedVerses.text: For I, the LORD your God, hold your right hand; it is I who say to you, "Fear not, I am the one who helps you."
Likewise the Spirit helps us in our weakness. For we do not know what to pray for as we ought, but the Spirit himself intercedes for us with groanings too deep for words.
If the iron is blunt, and one does not sharpen the edge, he must use more strength, but wisdom helps one to succeed.
Behold, the Lord GOD helps me; who will declare me guilty? Behold, all of them will wear out like a garment; the moth will eat them up.
Everyone helps his neighbor and says to his brother, "Be strong!"
